pr_title: ExecutionListeners for start and end of bg-deploy

timeline.message:
ExecutionListeners for start and end of bg-deploy

Add ExecutionListeners for the start and end of testing phase of
blue-green deploy. Refactor ProcessLoggerProvider to create non-existing
files. JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1870

timeline.bodyText: this is just a method wrapping another method with no additional value added
timeline.author: ikasarov

timeline.bodyText: and you're calling it the old way here as well
timeline.author: ikasarov
